Text: i told u. it's auto installer. it cracks automatically. just stay calm

It works. When I first opened it I was scared as hell, because it auto installed, I mean, usually you have to click two or 3 times on next, it did it super fast it self, I was like, what da.... I ran nod32 and found no viruses. The program is indeed registered. I was also able to update to built 4. Thanks to the uploader.
Don't upgrade, just leave it as it is. because it won't work if you do, it will ask for serial.
This program works but now causes my system blue screens once in a while and sometimes random system freezes.
